name: AlarmStatusToIconPipe
description:
Angular pipe for transforming alarm statuses into corresponding icons.

Example :
Usage in an Angular template:
{{ 'ACTIVE' | AlarmStatusToIcon }}
Result: 'bell'
rawdescription:
Angular pipe for transforming alarm statuses into corresponding icons.

```html
Usage in an Angular template:
{{ 'ACTIVE' | AlarmStatusToIcon }}
Result: 'bell'
```

methods.name: transform
methods.rawdescription: Transforms an alarm status into a corresponding icon.
